mode.title: Mode
mode.description: 1 = address, 2 = coordinates, 3 = address obj field (1 param), 4 = address custom field (1 params)

mode_params.title: Mode Parameters
mode_params.description: Mode Parameters: if mode=3, contains address IDs; if mode=4 - the address custom fields

merge_mode.title: Merge Mode
merge_mode.description: 1 = Keep as separate destinations, 2 = Merge into single destination

first_item_mode_params.title: First Item Mode Parametrs
first_item_mode_params.description: If first_item_mode=2, contains list of the custom times (EPOCH format)

additional_items_mode.title: Additional Items Mode
additional_items_mode.description: 1 = preserve original address service time, 2 = custom time (1 param), 3 = don't add

additional_items_mode_params.title: Additional Items Mode Parameters
additional_items_mode_params.description: If additional_items_mode=2, contains list of the custom times (EPOCH format)
